FINDCov19Tracker 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Get segregated tests from Selenium and combine them. Using the parameter days, all files in automated/merged/ are updated for the last dates given the input number.

Source: R/segregated_test.R
segregated_test_data.Rd

Input: Daily test data scraped via Selenium automated/fetch and automated/selenium directories.

Output:

  • segregated.csv

which are then deployed by CI to the automated/merged/ directory in the dsbbfinddx/FINDCov19TrackerData repo.

segregated_test_data(write = TRUE)

Arguments

write

if csv files should be written. Default TRUE.

Examples

get_test_data(days = 8, write = FALSE)

#> Warning: Changes on 2021-02-18 or before, should made directly in automated/merged
